org.openimaj.image.renderer

Class SVGRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.renderer.ImageRenderer<Float[],SVGImage>
      • org.openimaj.image.renderer.SVGRenderer

  • public class SVGRenderer
extends ImageRenderer<Float[],SVGImage>
    ImageRenderer for FImage images. Supports both anti-aliased and fast rendering.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
